title: Sirslash47's Personnel File
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[tabview]]
[[tab Profile]]
[[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; background:#F0F8FF; padding:5px; margin-bottom: 5px;"]]
Hey, I'm [[*user Sirslash47]]. Often also called Sirslash or Slash.

I first came into contact with the SCP-wiki a few years ago. Most likely somewhere between 2012-2014 but perhaps even sooner. I'd say somewhere in 2012 but I wouldn't bet on it. After 2014 I definitely knew what the wiki was. I kind of had an on-off thing where I remembered it and forgot it again.

I joined in May 2020 because I remembered that I could actually apply. I actually could have joined years sooner. But I'm glad that I'm here now. I see myself as a mediocre member of the wiki and user of the chat.

I hope I can build towards others their experience here in general. Thank you, for checking out my author page.
[[/div]]
[[/tab]]
[[tab Contributions]]
[[span style="color: #000;"]]
+ SCPs
[[/span]]
[[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; background:#F0F8FF; padding:5px; margin-bottom: 0px;"]]
In chronological order:
* [[[scp-5147|SCP-5147]]] "The Mannequin Troupe"
* [[[scp-5927|SCP-5927]]] "The Norther' Light Phantom"
* [[[scp-5623|SCP-5623]]] "Star Euthanizer"
* [[[scp-5839|SCP-5839]]] "There is no present like the future"
* [[[scp-5939|SCP-5939]]] "Stop and read The Roses"
* [[[scp-5843|SCP-5843]]] "Eyewitness"
* [[[scp-5849|SCP-5849]]] "Dead Letter Arrival"
* [[[scp-5857|SCP-5857]]] "BINARY STAR"
* [[[scp-649|SCP-649]]] "Matchbox Full of Winter" (Rewrite)
* [[[scp-5651|SCP-5651]]] "Wretched Core"
----
* [[[scp-6991|SCP-6991]]] "Den"
* [[[scp-5449|SCP-5449]]] "Choo Choo Spooder"
* [[[scp-6701|SCP-6701]]] "Shooting Star Swallow"
* [[[scp-6983|SCP-6983]]] "Kelvin"
* [[[scp-6971|SCP-6971]]] "Nuclearity"
* [[[scp-6143|SCP-6143]]] "Spooky Spacey Skeletons"
* [[[scp-7171|SCP-7171]]] "Skywatching" with [[*user Abrethe]] and [[*user Nyelo]]
* [[[scp-7717|SCP-7717]]] "Photogenic Apple"
[[/div]]
[[span style="color: #000;"]]
+ Tales
[[/span]]
[[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; background:#F0F8FF; padding:5px; margin-bottom: 0px;"]]
* A small poetry page: [[[from-syllables-to-lines-to-imagination|From syllables to lines to imagination]]]
* My gift to [[*user YellowISlol]] for the 2020 art exchange: [[[a-josie-holiday|A Josie Holiday]]]
* My first real tale: [http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/space-cadet-semantics Space Cadet Semantics]
* [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/it-s-better-to-burn-out-than-to-fade-away It's Better To Burn Out, Than To Fade Away]
* My gift to [[*user Aftokrator]] for the 2021 art exchange: [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/the-great-escape-of-6767-and-coffee-snake-art|The Great Escape of 6767 and Coffee Snake Art]]] which includes my first real artwork.
* [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/ad-fundum-universum-ad-fundum|Ad Fundum Universum, Ad Fundum]]]
[[/div]]
[[span style="color: #000;"]]
+ Miscellaneous
[[/span]]
[[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; background:#F0F8FF; padding:5px; margin-bottom: 0px;"]]
* --I added the heartwarming and tearjerkers lists in the [[[user-curated-lists|User Curated Lists]]]--
* This author page
* [[[into-the-void-hub|Into the Void Hub]]] together with [[*user Vivarium]]
* I did one Dutch translation on the [http://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/ Wanderer's Library] before I got this page. (Original author added it. Don't know the title anymore.)
* [[[wilson-s-wildlife-adoption-gallery|Wilson's Wildlife Adoption Gallery]]] together with [[*user AvocadoMilk]], [[*user Liryn]], [[*user Felixou]], [[*user NebulousStar]], [[*user Ralliston]]
[[/div]]
[[/tab]]
[[tab Favourites]]
[[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; background:#F0F8FF; padding:5px; margin-bottom: 0px;"]]
**My favourite SCP**
* [[[scp-5232|SCP-5232]]] "Roses in Her Eyes" by [[*user gerrymanderbassist]]
Runners-up;
* [[[scp-5270|SCP-5270]]] "Press X to bear" by [[*user gerrymanderbassist]] and [[*user penguin6]]
* [[[scp-1281|SCP-1281]]] "The Harbringer" by [[*User DrEverettmann]]
* [[[scp-4966|SCP-4966]]] "Tubbioca: Devourer of Souls, Consumer of Secrets, Lord of Munchies" by [[*User Deadly Bread]]
* [[[scp-1342|SCP-1342]]] "To the Makers of Music" by [[*User FlameShirt]]
* [[[scp-3340|SCP-3340]]] "You Think, Therefore We Are" by [[*user Ayers]]
* [[[scp-5610|SCP-5610]]] "To Put a Cat on Your Head" by [[*user Veralta]]
* [[[scp-3128|SCP-3128]]] "Let's Play Monopoly!" by [[*user the great hippo]]
* [[[scp-093|SCP-093]]] "Red Sea Object" by an unknown author
* [[[https://scp-int.wikidot.com/scp-007-int|SCP-007-INT]]] "Oneiric" by [[*user slashannemoo]] and [[*user DrGraph]] (This is an article on the International branch that deserves all the eyes it can get)
* [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-1233|SCP-1233]]] "The Lunatic" by [[*user CadaverCommander]]
**My favourite tale**

* [[[brasilic-folklore-and-mythology|Brasilic Folklore And Mythology]]] by [[*user Dr Leonerd]].

Contenders for that title;
* [[[ambrose-gloucester|Ambrose Gloucester: Best You Ever Had]]] by [[*user Riemann]]. Truly one of the best tales I ever had.
* [[[skyisover-thiscruelmoon-weintertwined|This Cruel Moon]]] by [[*user CelesteKara]]

**Favourite GoI**
* [[[manifest-3231|Manifest 3231: Dr. Haselhurst]]] by [[*user CityToast]]

**My favourite essays**
* [[[rounderhouse-critique-guide|ROUNDERHOUSE EXTREMELY GOOD AND OFFICIAL GUIDE TO BEING A SHITTY CRITTER]]] by, you guessed it, [[*user ROUNDERHOUSE]].
* [[[essays-by-a-hack-sentence-clauses|Essays By A Hack: Sentence Clauses]]] by [[*user The Great Hippo]].

I will put more works here over time.
[[/div]]
[[/tab]]
[[tab Art?]]
[[include component:image-block name=Sirslash.png|caption=A Coat of Arms made by [[*user SleepOfReason]]. "Don't touch my fries" is the motto because well... just don't touch them, ok?.|align=center]]
[[/tab]]
[[tab Others]]
[[span style="color: #000;"]]
+ To do list
[[/span]]
[[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; background:#F0F8FF; padding:5px; margin-bottom: 5px;"]]
* --Complete the gift-exchange-- Art exchange 2020 and 2021 done.
* --Enter a contest--
 * Entered CupidCon2021 with SCP-5839.
 * Entered Jamcon2021 (third theme: _famouslastwords) with SCP-5849.
 * Entered 6kcon with SCP-6991 (For a brief second CROM showed me as 6000, I'll take that too.)
 * Entered 7kcon with SCP-7171
* --Do a flight to better my critique skills-- 
 * Currently on hold and not getting answers back
* --Create or involve myself in a hub--
 * Into the Void Hub is a thing now.
[[/div]]
[[span style="color: #000;"]]
+ Writing Challenges
[[/span]]
[[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; background:#F0F8FF; padding:5px; margin-bottom: 5px;"]]
Here are writing challenges I dare you to try out. I have done some of these myself. I would like to throw you off a bit for a sense of surprise and adventure.
* Start from a random image (I can send you one with the link and licensebox if you want)
* Try to include sentences in a language you can't read.
* Write a thing for someone. Drawings and other artworks are also very nice for others to get unexpectedly.
[[/div]]
[[span style="color: #000;"]]
+ Will
[[/span]]
[[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; background:#F0F8FF; padding:5px; margin-bottom: 5px;"]]
In case that I am absent for a period of 2 years I want to establish [[*user Vivarium]] as the second contact to reach out in case of queries about my content.  For the art exchange gifts I would recommend to contact the receivers respectively. I would like my pages to stay up if possible but prefer a rewrite over a deletion.
[[/div]]
[[/tab]]
[[/tabview]]
@@ @@

[[include :scp-wiki:component:license-box]]

>

> **Image 2:** [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:%D0%93%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B1_%D0%B3%D0%BE%D1%80%D0%BE%D0%B4%D1%81%D0%BA%D0%BE%D0%B3%D0%BE_%D0%BF%D0%BE%D1%81%D0%B5%D0%BB%D0%B5%D0%BD%D0%B8%D1%8F_%D0%9D%D0%B0%D1%85%D0%B0%D0%B1%D0%B8%D0%BD%D0%BE.jpg Russian Coat of arms image], Unknown author, Public Domain (entire wording section on why it isn't copyright present)
> **Image 3:** [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:NROL_39_vector_logo.svg NROL39 vector logo], National Reconnaissance Office, Public Domain
> **Image 4:** [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:De_Lannoy_wapen.svg COA of De Lannoy], unknown author, CC SA 3.0
> **Image 5:** [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Coat_of_arms_of_d%27Udekem_d%27Acoz_(1999).svg COA d'Udekem d'Acoz (1999)], Tom Lemmens, CC SA 3.0
=====
[[include :scp-wiki:component:license-box-end]]

[[module css]]
/*SETTINGS HORIZONTAL LINE*/
.yui-navset .yui-nav,
.yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-nav {
    border:solid #D4CB6A; /* color of the horizontal line between tab list and selected content */
    border-width:0 0 5px; /*thickness of the horizontal line between tab list and content */
}
.yui-navset .yui-nav li,
.yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-nav li {
    margin:0 2px 0 0; /* space between tabs */
}
.yui-navset .yui-nav .selected,
.yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-nav .selected {
    margin:0 1px -1px 0; /* for overlap */
}
/* SETTINGS FOR UNSELECTED TABS */
.yui-navset .yui-nav a,
.yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-nav a {
    background:#D4CB6A url(http://themes.wikidot.com/local--files/rainbow-base/tabcolor.png) repeat-x -3px;
    border-top:solid #D4CB6A 1px;
    border-left:solid #D4CB6A 1px;
    border-right:solid #D4CB6A 1px;
    font-weight:none;
    font-family:Arial;
    font-size:140%;
    color:#000;/*tab text color*/
}
.yui-navset .yui-nav a em,
.yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-nav a em {
    border:solid #D4CB6A 0px;
}

/*HOVER SETTINGS FOR UNSELECTED TABS*/
.yui-navset .yui-nav a:hover,
.yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-nav a:hover {
    background:#D4CB6A
}

/* SETTINGS FOR SELECTED TABS */
.yui-navset .yui-nav .selected a,
.yui-navset .yui-nav .selected a:focus,
.yui-navset .yui-nav .selected a:hover {
    background:#D4CB6A url(https://themes.wikidot.com/local--files/rainbow-base/tabcolor.png) repeat-x -3px;
    color:black;border:1px solid #D4CB6A;font-weight:600
}

/* SETTINGS FOR SELECTED CONTENT */
.yui-navset .yui-content {
    background-color: #FFF7AA; /* content background color */
}
 
.yui-navset .yui-content,
.yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-content {
    border-color: #D4CB6A; /* content border */
    border-top-color:#D4CB6A; /* different border color */
}
 
.yui-navset-left .yui-content {
    border-color: #D4CB6A; /* content border */
    border-left-color: #D4CB6A; /* different border color */
}
 
.yui-navset-bottom .yui-content,
.yui-navset .yui-navset-bottom .yui-content {
    border-color: #D4CB6A; /* content border */
    border-bottom-color: #D4CB6A; /* different border color */
}
/* This removes the border around tab images. */
.yui-navset .yui-nav,
.yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-nav {
    border-color: transparent;
}
.yui-navset .yui-nav,
.yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-nav {
    border-color: #D4CB6A;
}
.yui-navset li {
    line-height: normal;
}
.yui-navset .yui-nav a em, .yui-navset .yui-navset-top .yui-nav a em {
    border-color: none;
    border-width: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    padding: 0.25em 0.75em;
    position: relative;
    right: 0;
    top: -1px;
}
span.redacted {
    color: black;
    background-color: black;
}
[[/module]]
author: Sirslash47
